\begin{table*}[t]
  \centering
  \caption{
  Effectiveness of our attack on $9$ mainstream white-box model watermarks embedded in industry-level DNNs. Results in the \textbf{Model Utility} column report the performance of the protected model before/after our attack. For \textbf{BER}, x/y/z stands for the re-scaled results without error handling, with Random Sampling and Max-First mechanism, respectively.
  }
  \scalebox{0.7}{
    \begin{tabular}{llllcccc}
    \toprule
 \multirow{2}[4]{*}{\textbf{Category}}  & \multirow{2}[4]{*}{\textbf{Watermark Scheme}}  & \multirow{2}[4]{*}{\textbf{Model-Dataset}} & \multirow{2}[4]{*}{\textbf{Model Utility}} & \multicolumn{4}{c}{\textbf{Bit Error Rate (BER) of Extracted Watermarks}} \\
\cmidrule{5-8}     &  &       &       & \textit{w/o. Attack} & \textit{NeuronZero} & \textit{NeuronClique} & \textit{NeuronSplit}   \\
     \midrule
    \multirow{5}[10]{*}{Weight-based} & Uchida et al. \cite{uchida2017embedding} & WRN-CIFAR10 & 91.55\%/91.55\%& 0\%   & {-/55.67\%/0\%} & {-/61.01\%/61.46\%} & {-/64.57\%/60.12\%} \\
\cmidrule{2-8}          & RIGA \cite{wang2021riga} & Inceptionv3-CelebA  & 95.90\%/95.90\% & 0\%   & {-/21.20\%/0\%} & {-/81.89\%/76.77\%} & {-/52.64\%/76.04\%} \\
\cmidrule{2-8}          & IPR-GAN \cite{ong2021iprgan} & DCGAN-CUB200 & 54.33/54.33 (FID \cite{heusel2017FID}) & 0\%    & {-/62.37\%/0\%} & {-/65.63\%/64.70\%} & {-/54.93\%/55.86\%} \\
\cmidrule{2-8}          & Greedy Residuals\cite{liu2021greedyresiduals} & ResNet18-Caltech256 & 55.05\%/55.05\% & 0\%   & {57.56\%} & {57.57\%} & {53.10\%} \\
\cmidrule{2-8}          & Lottery Verification \cite{chen2021lottery} & ResNet18-CIFAR100 & 66.40\%/66.40\% & 0\%   & {-/46.53\%/0\%} & {-/48.77\%/47.05\%} & {-/48.77\%/47.05\%} \\
    \midrule
    \multirow{2}[4]{*}{Activation-based} & DeepSigns \cite{darvish2019deepsigns} & WRN-CIFAR10 & 89.94\%/89.94\% &  0\%     &   {-66.63\%/0\%}   &    {-/68.09\%/52.59\%}   &   {-/69.56\%/47.59\%}   \\
\cmidrule{2-8}          & IPR-IC \cite{lim2022ipcaption} & ResNet50+LSTM-COCO & 72.06/72.06 (BLEU-1 \cite{Papineni2002BleuAM}) &    0\%   &   {-/49.36\%/0\%}    &   {-/56.12\%/56.95\%}    &   {-/56.27\%/52.60\%} \\
    \midrule
